types.title: Area types list
types.description: List of area types that are supposed to be hosted

items.title: Area type
items.description: Definition of an area type, consisting out of a name and a group of area sources.

name.title: Area type name
name.description: Name of the area type as it may be displayed to the user

sources.title: Area sources list
sources.description: List of sources to be used for collecting and requesting areas of this type

items.title: Area type source
items.description: Source of an area type that describes how the corresponding area data is supposed to be extracted from OSM data, stored in a database, delivered on requests and displayed in an application

filter_parameters.title: Filter conditions
filter_parameters.description: Array of Osmfilter arguments that allow the extraction of geometries for this area type source from OSM data

labels.title: Labeling options
labels.description: Defines labeling options for this area type source. If no labels are desired, "null" should be assigned instead of an options object.

arced.title: Arced
arced.description: Whether the labels are supposed to be displayed arced

zoom_min.title: Minimum zoom level
zoom_min.description: Minimum zoom value (inclusive) for which the labels for this area source type are supposed to be displayed. Needs to be greater than or equal to the zoom_min field of the underlying area type source.

zoom_max.title: Maximum zoom level
zoom_max.description: Maximum zoom value (exclusive) for which the labels for this area source type are supposed to be displayed. Needs to be less than or equal to the zoom_max field of the underlying area type source.

resource.title: Resource Name
resource.description: Name of the resource under which the geometrical data for this area type source will be provided by the area server. Needs to be unique among all area types

table_name.title: Database table name
table_name.description: Name of the database table to use for storing geometries of this area type source. Needs to be unique among all area types

search_highlight.title: Highlight search result
search_highlight.description: Specifies whether areas of this area type are supposed to be highlighted as search results

simplification.title: Simplification flag
simplification.description: Specifies whether the geometries for this area type are supposed to be simplified with respect to the zoom level

z_index.title: Z-Index
z_index.description: The z-index determines the order in which geometries of different area types are supposed to be drawn. Geometries of an area type with a higher z-index will be drawn on top of geometries of area types with a lower z-index. The behaviour for area types with the same z-index is undefined. The z-index of area types will not interfere with the z-index of other layers within OpenLayers, since those are considered separately

zoom_min.title: Minimum zoom level
zoom_min.description: Minimum zoom value (inclusive) for which areas of this type source are supposed to be displayed

zoom_max.title: Maximum zoom level
zoom_max.description: Maximum zoom value (exclusive) for which areas of this type source are supposed to be displayed
